name: Wyvern Toolkit
author: codewyvern

sections.description:
We know how hard it is to find the right set of tools for a website, so we combined all of the best in one toolkit. Wyvern Toolkit bundles advanced features, custom settings, and professional tools, to give you everything you need in one interface. Forget about the hassle of installing and configuring dozens of plugins. Just install Wyvern Toolkit once and get what you need to be done with ease!

Wyvern Toolkit is a fast, reliable, and affordable professional WordPress plugin that does everything you need to create and manage an amazing website. It comes with all the essentials so you do not have to install multiple plugins for each task. With Wyvern Toolkit, you can have anything from a blog to an eCommerce store and much more. Anyone can install and use this plugin in minutes and get going with their site with all the tools needed.
sections.installation:
1. Open WordPress admin, go to Plugins, and click Add New
  2. Enter “Wyvern Toolkit” in search and hit Enter
  3. Plugin will show up as the first on the list, click “Install Now”
  4. Activate & open the plugin’s page from the admin menu

Or if needed, upload manually;

  1. Download the latest stable version from from downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wyvern-toolkit.zip
  2. Unzip it and upload it to /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Open WordPress Dashboard > Plugins and click “Activate” next to “Wyvern Toolkit”
  4. Open the plugin’s page from the admin menu
sections.faq:
What are the currently available modules in Wyvern Toolkit?

We are continuosly adding new features and modules. Click here to view all available modules.

Do you have any documentation or a get started guide?

Yes, we do provide documentation. Please click this link for the documentation.

Do you provide any support for the free version?

Yes, we are always ready for it. Whenever you need it, you can contact us on our plugin support forum.

Does this plugin provides the option to download google fonts?

Yes, Wyvern Toolkit provides the option to search and download available google fonts for your website.

I need a preloader for my website. Does Wyvern Toolkit provide a preloader feature in the free version?

Wyvern Toolkit provides a powerful yet flexible Preloader with a bunch of options to choose from.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6 – 2023-02-06

  • Fix – Blank screen on update in some devices

1.0.5 – 2023-02-06

  • Fix – Stats consent model issue
  • Fix – Fatal error issue with API controller loader
  • Enhancement – Added supports demo import for themes using Import/Export module

1.0.4 – 2022-12-05

  • Add – Settings Page
  • Add – Store Manager
  • Fix – Set current admin submenu selected
  • Fix – Make strings translatable
  • Fix – Minor issues fix with Google Fonts module

1.0.3 – 2022-08-08

  • Add – Custom Scripts module
  • Add – Admin menu icon
  • Fix – Fix admin css issues
  • Enhancement – Move Store directory to WordPress Uploads directory
  • Enhancement – Update readme.txt

1.0.2 – 2022-07-31

  • Enhancement – Change plugin icon
  • Enhancement – Update Screenshots
  • General – Fix minor issues

1.0.1 – 2022-07-31

  • Enhancement – Add plugin description and banner images
  • General – Fix minor issues

1.0.0 – 2022-07-31

  • Initial release
